query:
UPDATE transportation 
SET 
  origin = 'BTS Airport',
  destination = 'BTS Airport',
  notes = CONCAT(IFNULL(origin, ''), ' ', IFNULL(notes, ''))
WHERE type = 'car_rental' AND company = 'Surprice';
command:

WHERE type = 'car_rental' AND company = 'Surprice';
